Text:
Thank you for all your hard work. I love MythBusters. It is much appreciated. You have allowed me to view all lot of quality shows I wouldn't otherwise would not be able to watch. 
Oh yeah thanks for the work you do with the Daily show and Colbert report too. (Too lazy to post my thanks twice so I thought I'd cram em in here.) In short: TvTeam KICKS ASS!
